entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 11 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
